question:
How to dust a room

Choices:
A: Take a feather or magnetic duster and thoroughly go through all the nooks and crannies of your house and things. Repeat this weekly.
B: Take a feather or magnetic duster and thoroughly go through all the nooks and crannies of your house and things. Repeat this monthly.
steps: To ensure a room remains clean and dust-free, regular maintenance is necessary.
Dust accumulates quickly and can affect air quality and cleanliness if not managed properly.
Using a feather or magnetic duster is effective in cleaning hard-to-reach areas and surfaces.
Cleaning every week helps to manage dust accumulation efficiently and keeps the room cleaner.
Cleaning monthly may allow too much dust to accumulate, causing potential hygiene or allergy issues.
Therefore, the best practice is to repeat dusting weekly.
